sentence.Network_en: The Swiss wanted to discourage an inflow of foreign money.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑞士人想要阻止外资流入。

sentence.Network_en: Many parents find it hard to discourage bad behaviour.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多父母觉得要孩子循规蹈矩是件很难的事情。

sentence.Network_en: His parents tried to discourage his interest in music, but he persisted.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的父母设法打消他对音乐的兴趣，但他始终坚持。

list.abs: bing词典——英语部落格 - 人人小站 ... Present value： 现值 Discouraged workers： 丧失信心的工人 Disposable income： 可支配收 …
失去信心的工人（discouraged workers）是游荡在劳动力市场边缘的人员中的一部分，他们因就业市场不景气而暂时没有寻找工作。 …
所谓的沮丧劳工(discouraged worker)指的是原本没有工作想要找工作，但放弃找工作者因此，按照我们上面的定义~他们应该归于非 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French descouragier, from des- (expressing reversal) + corage 'courage'

entry.def: If someone or something discourages you, they cause you to lose your enthusiasm about your actions.

example.ex: It may be difficult to do at first. Don't let this discourage you.
example.tran: 万事开头难，别因此而灰心。

entry.def: To discourage an action or to discourage someone from doing it means to make them not want to do it.

example.ex: ...typhoons that discouraged shopping and leisure activities.
example.tran: 使购物和休闲活动化为泡影的台风

example.ex: ...a campaign to discourage children from smoking.
example.tran: 劝阻儿童远离香烟的运动

means.word_mean: 1. try to prevent; show opposition to;

sentences.sentence: "We should discourage this practice among our youth"

means.word_mean: 2. deprive of courage or hope; take away hope from; cause to feel discouraged
3. admonish or counsel in terms of someone's behavior;

sentences.sentence: "I warned him not to go too far"

auth_sentence.content: I don't discourage any of that at all.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't discourage any of that at all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't discourage any of that at all.

auth_sentence.content: This will discourage many elderly people from coming out.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will discourage many elderly people from coming out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This will discourage many elderly people from coming out.

auth_sentence.content: It's easy to discourage people from doing it.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's easy to discourage people from doing it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's easy to discourage people from doing it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: And it may be especially discouraging if you happen to be looking for a job or hoping to change careers right now.
The research argued that boys often perform badly in mixed schools because they become discouraged when their female peers do better earlier in speaking and reading skills.
But children are frequently discouraged from involvement with natural spaces, for health and safety reasons, for fear that they might get dirty or that they might cause damage.
Societies that cannot replace their populations discourage investment and innovation.
These should discourage retailers from wasteful practices that lead to the rejection of food on the basis of cosmetic characteristics, and losses in the home due to excessive purchasing by consumers

means.word_mean: 使气馁; 使沮丧；使泄气；使丧失信心

sentences.en: Don't let one failure discourage you.
We discourage smoking in this school.
sentences.cn: 在这所学校里我们劝阻吸烟。

jushi.english: The difficult work discouraged Alan and he left school.
jushi.chinese: 难学的功课使艾伦失去信心,因此他退学了。

jushi.english: He is easily discouraged by difficulties and obstacles.
jushi.chinese: 他遇到困难和障碍时很容易气馁。
